case.state: You're inviting me to play strip poker? I cannot express enough how much I don't have plans.
Alcohol and questionable decision making? Sign me up!
Alcohol and questionable decision making? Sign me up!
Alcohol and questionable decision making? Sign me up!
Yeah, gimme ~cards~!
Oh, I know this. ~cards~ cards, dealer.
I'm feeling lucky. Give me ~cards~.
I'm warning you guys, I'm pretty good at poker.
Bring it on.
Cool!
We're number one! Or I am, anyway.
I'm ready to show my hand! So, so ready.
Let's dance.
April, you look familiar. Have you been on TV? Or, um, in porn?
Very nice cards. Very not pathetic.
Poker is a game of psychology, you know.
Don't rush me... there's a lot of strategy going on here.
I won't cheat if you don't!
What's the chance of me winning with this hand? I shoulda paid more attention in math class.
Did you ever think we'd end up playing this together, Buff?
Very nice cards. Very not pathetic.
Poker is a game of psychology, you know.
Don't rush me... there's a lot of strategy going on here.
I won't cheat if you don't!
What's the chance of me winning with this hand? I shoulda paid more attention in math class.
You were a cheerleader, Kim? Tell me all about it! Spare no detail, especially if they involve the uniform.

Poker is a game of psychology, you know.
Don't rush me... there's a lot of strategy going on here.
I won't cheat if you don't!
What's the chance of me winning with this hand? I shoulda paid more attention in math class.
Mileena, did anyone tell you the point of the game? Just wondering, because... bandages.

What's the chance of me winning with this hand? I shoulda paid more attention in math class.
I'm playing strip poker with an elf! And this isn't even in the top 10 strangest events in my life.

Don't rush me... there's a lot of strategy going on here.

I won't cheat if you don't!

Harley, your makeup is freaking me out. I have childhood trauma involving a clown and a birthday party.

Don't rush me... there's a lot of strategy going on here.
I won't cheat if you don't!
What's the chance of me winning with this hand? I shoulda paid more attention in math class.

Don't rush me... there's a lot of strategy going on here.
I won't cheat if you don't!
What's the chance of me winning with this hand? I shoulda paid more attention in math class.
So you're a witch, Hermione? Sometimes I think about two women doing a spell. And then I do a spell by myself.

Don't rush me... there's a lot of strategy going on here.
I won't cheat if you don't!
What's the chance of me winning with this hand? I shoulda paid more attention in math class.

Don't rush me... there's a lot of strategy going on here.
I won't cheat if you don't!
What's the chance of me winning with this hand? I shoulda paid more attention in math class.
I'll make you a deal, Shaggy. I won't call you Norville if you never mention my middle name.
Very nice cards. Very not pathetic.
Poker is a game of psychology, you know.
Don't rush me... there's a lot of strategy going on here.
I won't cheat if you don't!
What's the chance of me winning with this hand? I shoulda paid more attention in math class.
For the record, Seven, I'd rate you an eight, maybe a nine! Wait... is that your actual name?
Very nice cards. Very not pathetic.
Poker is a game of psychology, you know.
Don't rush me... there's a lot of strategy going on here.
I won't cheat if you don't!
What's the chance of me winning with this hand? I shoulda paid more attention in math class.
Did you ever think you'd see me like this, Buff? ...What do you think?
This game is trickier than James Bond movies made it out to be.
Just for the record: we get our clothes back later, right?
Hey! My eyes are up here!
I'm surrounded by beautiful women, at least some of whom are going to get naked. I think I've died and gone to Heaven.
Hey, guys? Not to alarm anybody, but I think someone forgot to invite the femmes.
I was promised casual nudity... I just expected that to mean 'boobs'. Silly me.
Very nice cards. Very not pathetic.
Poker is a game of psychology, you know.
Don't rush me... there's a lot of strategy going on here.
I won't cheat if you don't!
What's the chance of me winning with this hand? I shoulda paid more attention in math class.
Come on, Daddy needs a new pair of shoes! ...No, really, I want to win mine back.
This game is trickier than James Bond movies made it out to be.
Just for the record: we get our clothes back later, right?
I was born ready! Also naked. Hmm.
It's not the cards you're dealt, it's how you play them.
Hey! My eyes are up here!
Man!
I got nothin'.
Man, my whole life just flashed in front of my eyes! ...I gotta get me a life.
Did I mention that I hate this game?
Why didn't I put on a sweater today? Or a parka?
I don't know how, but I'm going to blame this on vampires.
But I had two pair! Aw, man. This is harder than it looks.
Don't worry, I got a system. You won't get me again.
You got me!
It wouldn't be fun if I didn't strip too, would it?
This is cool. We're in the Strip club, which is kind of like the Chess club, only with stripping... and, um, no chess.
Well played.
That's cheating! I was distracted by everyone else stripping.
I laugh in the face of danger! Then I hide until it goes away.
I lost? Better stand back. There's gonna be some heat, if you know what I mean.
You want me to strip for you? Explain the part where that's bad.
Would you believe this is all part of my plan?
I went for a straight and ended up with nothing. Who hasn't made that mistake seven, eight times?
I woke up the other day with this feeling in my gut. I just know. There is no way I'm getting out of this game clothed.
Why is it that I've come face-to-face with vampires, demons, the most hideous creatures hell ever spit out, and I'm still afraid of stripping in front of others?
Ahh! Man down!
Ah, Lady Luck. She is a fickle mistress.
I lost? I'm gonna do what any man would do about it: somethin' damn manly.
Daring is my middle name! Well, actually, it's LaVelle, and I'd appreciate it if you'd guard that secret with your life.
Guys, I'm all alone here. Somebody has to strip with me!
Are you noticing a theme here?
Damn it! You know what? I'm sick of this crap. I'm sick of being the guy who eats insects, and gets the funny syphilis. As of this moment, it's over. I'm finished being everybody's butt-monkey.
Okay, you know what? I don't need this!
I was, uh, dressed a minute ago! It's a dream. It's gotta be a dream. Ow! Wake up. Ow! Gotta wake up.
To show you just how little I'm worried, I'm going to start big.
Let me just take off my shirt.
Let's just turn this down a notch.
There you go, one sock. ...Okay, okay! I'll take the other one off too.
This isn't how this game was supposed to go.
You've got me down to my underwear, but that's it! ...And I am really jinxing the hell out of myself by saying that.
Playing cards with you is like fighting a gorilla with a banana. You can't win and he leaves you empty handed.
What? I... Well, yes, I do want to do all of those things, Zone-tan.
Go ahead, mock me.
Feast your eyes all you want!
I wonder what you see in me? It's probably the quiet good looks coupled with a certain smoky magnetism.
You know, uh, maybe it's time to take this game seriously. Like I wasn't.
I don't know... can you handle all this?
I'm not a loser! I'm a strong, successful male who is giddy at the thought of all the women I will no doubt be dating in the near future.
Okay. I'm not panicking. I'm not. I'm not. STOP LOOKING AT ME LIKE I'M PANICKING!
Rookie mistake, ~name~.
Is that all you got?
This looks like a job for ~name~!
Now entering Stripville, population: ~name~.
Is failing your thing? You can be honest, I won't judge.
Go on, ~name~. Make us proud.
Take that, ~name~!
If it means I don't lose this hand, woo! And might I add a big hoo!
Brave sir ~name~, your sacrifice will not be in vain!
Looks like you're not as good as you thought, ~name~.
This time, it's personal.
Ha! In your face!
Hey, look! Literally anything else. Let's all pay attention to ~name~ stripping.
Take that!
Rookie mistake, ~name~.
Is that all you got?
This looks like a job for ~name~!
Now entering Stripville, population: ~name~.
Is failing your thing? You can be honest, I won't judge.
Go on, ~name~. Make us proud.
Take that, ~name~!
If it means I don't lose this hand, woo! And might I add a big hoo!
Brave sir ~name~, your sacrifice will not be in vain!
Looks like you're not as good as you thought, ~name~.
This time, it's personal.
Ha! In your face!
Hey, look! Literally anything else. Let's all pay attention to ~name~ stripping.
Take that!
The controversial 'high card' strategy pays off for Xander. Suck it, probability!
Hey, this game may not suck!
We're off to a good start!
Like I say: ladies first!
Don't hate the player, hate the game.
Huh. What are the odds of that?
See that? That, ladies, is allll skill.
I don't know about anybody else, but I'm having a good time.
Yeah! This is what I came here for!
That's how it's done, ladies!
Read 'em and weep, ladies.
Aw yeah, ~name~ is going into strip-mode.
Losing my shirt was worth it!
Yessss!
I wouldn't mind seeing more of you, ~name~.
Remind me to tip the dealer later.
Yes! Suck on that, probability!
Man, your timing really doesn't suck!
Just what I was thinking about!
The joke's on you! I'm used to being a loser.
Buffy, Buffy, Buffy. Poker is a man's game!
Please let it be Buffy... please let it be Buffy... yesssss!
Oh, you wanna strip. I saw that half-smile, you little slut.
Huh. What are the odds of that?
As a red-blooded American, I treat everyone the same. So get stripping, your highness!
Your turn, Blondie.
Your turn, Red.
The controversial 'high card' strategy pays off for Xander. Suck it, probability!
Hey, this game may not suck!
We're off to a good start!
Like I say: ladies first!
Don't hate the player, hate the game.
Huh. What are the odds of that?
See that? That, ladies, is allll skill.
I don't know about anybody else, but I'm having a good time.
Yeah! This is what I came here for!
That's how it's done, ladies!
Read 'em and weep, ladies.
Aw yeah, ~name~ is going into strip-mode.
Losing my shirt was worth it!
Yessss!
I wouldn't mind seeing more of you, ~name~.
Yes! Suck on that, probability!
Remind me to tip the dealer later.
Man, your timing really doesn't suck!
Just what I was thinking about!
The joke's on you! I'm used to being a loser.
Your ~clothing~? Whoa, check out Mr. Excitement here!
Dude - that's it?
So this is what having fun is like? It's different from what I expected.
C'mon, man, be a team player.
Having issues much?
Ooo, gang, did ya hear that? ~name~'s taking off his ~clothing~! Mix in a little rectal surgery, and it's my best day ever!
What are you taking off, ~name~? I can't quite... oh! I see! It's your dignity.
Your ~clothing~? I need a volunteer to hit ~name~.
Well, well, well. Look at Mister Card-Shark finally losing a hand.
The important thing is that you believe that was clothing.
Wait, so I can count my ~clothing~ as clothing? Cool! Of course, that's hypothetical in my case.
Huh. Sometimes I just don't get the sophisticated poker lifestyle.
Why would you even wear that in the first place?
Whoa, let's stop this crazy whirligig of fun! I'm dizzy!
You're a bad, bad man.
I mention today how much I don't like you?
I'm just gonna go home, lie down and listen to country music. The music of pain.
Really? I bet you don't remember that you owe me twenty bucks either, D.Va.
If I'd known this would be filmed live... well, I still would have come, but I'd have worn more layers!
And I am Xander, son of Anthony and Jessica, renters of 1630 Revello Drive. Nice to meet you.
And I am Xander, son of Anthony and Jessica, angry alcoholics! You owe me your crown, I believe.
Really? 'Cause I was thinking your dress would be next.
Can I talk you out of that decision? You have so many other options! Like your dress! And, um... your dress!
You bet! I can't believe you're playing strip poker with me, Buffy! This is awesome!
Keep telling yourself that, D.Va.
I prefer to think of them as 'an obstacle to seeing you naked'.
Hey, the princess makes the rules, right?
If my word is really your command then I'd like a word in private...
Sadly, tragically, yes.
Is it your boobs? Please say boobs!
It feels weird for me too, Nagisa. Wait, no. Not weird. Hot. I mean it feels hot.
Well, this is already going better than my last date!
Now I can forget my fear of dying and move on to my fear of humiliating myself!
Honestly, I've never been into shoes. Now, navels on the other hand...
Sadly, awfully, tragically... yes, it counts. Sigh.
It's adorable how embarrassed you're getting. And probably immoral.
The way this game is going, I believe you.
And you sound so happy about it, too!
Reluctant stripping is the best kind!
You named your boots? Seriously?
~Name~ is avoiding showing skin? Well, bust out the big box of crayons and color me shocked!
Hey, a win is a win.
Oh, your ~clothing~. Big fun.
Okay, not quite the reaction I was looking for. Let's try that again, only this time take off your top.
Are you kidding?
Cold, ~name~.
You're killing me here!
Sure, go on and humiliate me. It's bordering on trendy at this point.
I'm not enjoying this.
No, no, no! You're ruining the ambiance. Look, I'll just close my eyes, you can put your ~clothing~ back on, and we'll try it once more with feeling.
You're kidding! ...You're not kidding, are you?
Oh, COME ON!
Be still my heart. Oh, wait, it is.
One word: evil.
Necklaces are hearts. Got it.
Okay, that... came out of nowhere.
Ooh, can I play too? A bird shall fly into the window. Splat shall go its head.
Freaked out shall all the other players be.
Um, right! That's definitely what I meant to say. Not those other words.
Geez, Buff. You know I'm already crazy about you.
Is that a threat? Because I've been threatened by a lot of people, and I suddenly realize that doesn't say much about me.
You sure know how to motivate a guy, Daisy!
Riding a jaquin barefoot? Is that like 'making the beast with two backs'?
Now there's a vivid thought.
Trying to psych me out? I've heard worse threats before breakfast! No, really, I actually have.
...Is it wrong if I'm turned on by your begging? It is, isn't it? Bad, bad Xander.
I, for one, would just like to say 'thank you' for putting your gun away, Leela.
Yes, it's your hair I've been staring at all this time.
Not so much. But hey, don't give up.
I dunno, Angela... I've always preferred dirty girls.
I don't know why you're wearing a shirt, either! ...It was worth a try, right?
No! No, of course not! ...A little bit, yeah.
I'm scared stiff! Get it? Stiff? Because I--aw, forget it.
Lady, you aren't even in the top 10 this week.
Wait, wait - you've been so daring, why stop now?
You're really into this roleplaying thing, huh, BlackRose?
I have no idea what you're saying half the time, Dawn. But you're getting naked, so I'm okay with that.
Oh yeah? Well, I don't need shoes to get my butt kicked! ...Can we pretend I didn't say that?
Yeah... that's why I took mine off! Not because I was losing.
You're so cute and earnest, Elena. It's like playing strip poker with a sister.
Your evil plan is working, Buff.
...Is it wrong if I'm turned on by this? It is, isn't it? Bad, bad Xander.
Good times, good times.
I'm a patient man. I can wait.
I guess that's what I get for playing with Little Miss Modesty.
Shy much, ~name~?
Can you say 'underwhelmed'?
Boy, ~name~, you're a regular breath of vile air.
Here I thought I'd finally see something good. Yeah, I'm irrational that way.
I don't love you anymore.
Yeah... no, Fred.
Nice try, Fred. Now strip 'em!
Lose the ~clothing~, ~name~.
I'm sure you're making someone very happy, ~name~. Someone with bad taste.
Ah, taking off layers as slowly as possible? A technique I know well.
Check out Mister Courage over here, takin' off his ~clothing~.
Quit stalling and just do it.
That's a joke, right?
Your ~clothing~? I need this about as much as I need a hole in my head.
Hey, anything that distracts people from me is a good thing.
Your ~clothing~? I need a volunteer to hit ~name~.
Aw, don't be a sissy-man, ~name~. Go for something big!
Not too shabby, ~name~. Just shabby enough.
Move along, folks. Nothing to see here.
I'm gonna win, I'm gonna win...
I love your ~clothing~. Do they make them for men?
Yeah, yeah. You're bad to the bone, I get it.
Ever had one of those days? That's my whole life.
I mention today how much I don't like you?
You know, some of us aren't afraid to let it all hang out...
If I can masturbate to scrambled cable, I can do this.
I'm starting to understand why people drink.
Yes, yes. I've learned a valuable lesson here. Can we move on?
You are not being the person Mister Rogers knows you can be.
Awww... I was hoping you'd leave them on until last.
The obvious choice, maybe. The fun choice? Not in a million years. Why does nobody ever consider the fun choice?
Okay, yes, sure. But why go with the obvious choice when you could surprise everyone instead?
...How do you feel about shirt, no shirt?
Eh, I'll take what I can get.
I saw that one coming... yet I'm still disappointed.
Oh, way to dash my hopes and dreams. You are evil!
Gettin' a mite wild there, Buffy. Might wanna tone it down a tad.
No hesitation? This is gonna be a good game.
Baby steps, ~name~. Baby steps.
If you're blushing already, I can't wait to see you by the end of the game.
Geez, ~name~. You can't play hard to get if you're already hard to want.
That's it? I'd rather take a bath with a toaster than continue to play with you.
I'm having fun already!
I won't lie - the way you take off your ~clothing~ is pretty sexy.
You're going to take off your bra, ~name~? ...What? I can dream.
Have you considered being a little bolder? Some of us like that sort of thing in a girl.
I had something else in mind... something more underwear-y.
Looking at your ~clothing~ makes me want to have sex. Of course, looking at linoleum makes me want to have sex.
You're really good at this.
That's all? I'm a man, you know. I have certain desires, certain needs...
If I were you I'd pick something bigger. ...Of course, if I were you, I'd be playing with my boobs, so what do I know?
That's why I love you, ~name~! You just keep me guessing!
You remind me of Cordy. Rockin' bod, but getting her out of her clothes was like pulling teeth.
You're gonna give me a heart attack if you keep teasing me like this.
You have definitely played this before.
Do I want ~name~ to take off her ~clothing~ instead of something bigger? Well, that's a tough question to... No. Not a chance.
I'm just not gonna win here, am I?
If you're trying to tease me into a frenzy, it's working.
You completely beat me! Man, smart chicks are so hot.
And to think I gave up a sybaritic evening of television and stale chips for this.
I'd pay good money to see you bend! Wait... you're talking about magic, aren't you, Korra? Darn it.
Well, okay, I will! But only because you asked so nicely, BlackRose.
Hey, if you want to explore this new risk-taking, devil may care attitude after the game, uh, I'm here for you, Buff!
Regular girl, maybe. Plain? Never.
Oh, I'm very friendly, Lux.
Well, yes... but that's normal for me.
Honestly? Not particularly.
I wasn't ogling! I don't ogle. Do I?
It figures...
Typical! Why does every beautiful woman I meet have to be evil? Uh, other girls present excepted.
I'm with you 100%, Buff. In fact, I don't think you're going far enough! Why worry about tomorrow? Strip today!
It's about time you came out of your shell, Buff.
I like your smile. You should smile more.
Why haven't I played this before?! ...Oh, right. Because nobody invites me.
You're beautiful even when you're stripping. Especially when you're stripping.
...Yay?
This is surprisingly hot!
What's the matter, afraid of getting naked with the Xand? I won't bite... unless you want me to.
How about we trying being a bit more revealing and a bit less shy? Not me, just you.
Typical trick. Promise shirt, deliver ~clothing~.
I know I said I wanted to see how you looked without a shirt on, but I meant when you were topless!
So this is what I missed by not going to college? Meh.
Sigh. I guess that'll do.
Hmm, it actually kinda turns me on.
You know, I don't know what everybody's talking about. That outfit doesn't make you look like a hooker.
Keep this up and you'll get your license suspended for driving me crazy!
Well, it's this or my imagination, so... I'll make it work.
I never had a chance, did I?
No. No, I am not, Fred.
Did I mention that I'm having a very strange night?
Sensing a disturbance in the force, ~name~?
I have really mixed feelings right now.
The good news: ~name~ is closer to losing. The bad news: we all get to see more of him.
Hey, anything that distracts people from me is a good thing.
I'm sure this is doing it for someone.
I'll have you down to nothing before I even take off my pants!
I'll just look over there, where I haven't looked yet.
Play strip poker, they said. You'll see boobs, they said.
Yup. Still straight.
If I can masturbate to scrambled cable, I can do this.
Well, that's a step closer to the game ending.
I have no idea, Asuna. But I can tell you that seeing you take it off is priceless.
I'm not sure how that's a disadvantage, Buff.
I like this girl. Have I mentioned I like this girl?
I guess you do, your highness.
Hands up everyone who didn't see this coming. Anyone? Anyone at all?
What if I judge them 'terrific'?
May I congratulate you on a magnificent premiere?
Man, you're adorable. Like a... frightened puppy. I have the most confused boner right now.
Say no more! You need help taking off your clothes? Xander's your man!
Oh, I wouldn't say nothing.
Are we talking sexy situations or dangerous situations? I'm, uh, asking for a friend.
And thank goodness for that!
If only more girls would follow your example...
That's what she said! ...Oh, wait.
Thank you, Fred!
Don't think of us like strangers! Think of us like family! Strangely aroused family.
Neat trick, Buff. For your next one, how about making your shirt disappear?
Wow, that is tight. And so are your pants!
Ah, a girl who knows what a man wants to hear.
Your ~clothing~ is very bueno.
It's nice to finally meet a girl whose interest in showing off her body matches mine in seeing it.
You've got nothing to worry about, ~name~. You underestimate how gorgeous you are.
Take your time! The slower you strip, the hotter it gets.
I can't believe I'm saying this, but it's a shame to get you out of that uniform, ~name~. I've always liked the schoolgirl look.
Out of uniform, ~name~? That's a spanking.
You da man, ~name~!
whistles
I feel a high-five coming on.
This is better than prom night! Which isn't actually saying much in my case.
Now you're talking!
I never thought I'd get to see this without a high-powered telescope! Um. Sometimes I shouldn't say words.
Have I mentioned how much I love this game?
Your ~clothing~ must be really uncomfortable, ~name~.
I seem to have lost my underwear... can I see yours?
A little visual stimulation never hurt anyone.
At this point, this is a little anticlimactic. Aw, who am I kidding? This is awesome!
Oh, hey! Your underwear matches your stockings. That's unexpected.

state.text: So... you're really into stripes, huh?

case.state: Sensing a theme with your underwear here.
You know, a lot of people think plain white is boring. I prefer to think of it as 'blank canvas'.
Nice underwear. Very... plain.
Pink hair, red dress, white underwear. One of these things is not like the others...
Aw, I was hoping to see magic underwear.
Nice, uh, chest wrappings. Wait, what?
No, not the lamest... I mean, surely there's been worse... okay, yeah. It was pretty awful.
Lady, you have some serious childhood trauma to deal with.
And I would love to give you one. Come here, D.Va!
A trap? Come on, Daph. You're just bad at this, that's all.
And may I say that I'm very grateful for that, Dawn?
Your Abuelo might not approve, but I sure do, princess!
If it helps, I can pretend to be surprised.
You must be starting, because I'm heating up already, Korra!
I'm not sure I should tell you what I'm imagining, Kyoko...
Yes, yes I am. Thanks for asking, May.
That's good, Meg, because I'm probably going to be doing that a lot.
A cute bra for a cute girl.
I'm not sure. Show me more of it and I'll tell you if it's weird, Lux.
Oh, it is getting hard all right, Mia!
Wha? Oh! Sorry, BlackRose. I'll just wipe that off.
I hope you're OK with me staring at the rest of you, too.
You know what they say: 'almost' only counts in horseshoes and hand grenades.
You don't have to be witty, Buff. We can appreciate your other qualities.
